name: Boram_Huy.file [DEMO]
description:
Two classmates find themselves stranded on an island! Your job is to help them navigate this strange place.

🌊--=--=--=--🌊

Made for the Sweet to Sour Game Jam 2023

FEATURES:

  • Dialogue heavy.
  • Cute creatures.
  • Goofy classmates.
  • 4 different endings.
    • Each playthrough approximately 50 minutes.
  • Comedy(?).

"This game contains depictions of blood & death and might not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised."

Now, enjoy!

🍐--=--=--=--🍐

CONTROLS:

Movement : Arrow keys
Accept: [Z] [Enter] [Space]
Cancel/Menu: [X] [Ins]
Running: Shift

🍐--=--=--=--🍐

KEEP IN MIND! This game is a DEMO! To be honest, we did not have time to playtest everything lol. Please report the bugs you may encounter and any missing assets. We do have plans to make a better, polished release in the future!
